name: manywords
description:
use blocks to compose as many words as you can before time runs out!

game made in about 4 days for tobujam #1

fonts used: 04b03, Peaberry

sounds made using ChipTone

palette is hept32

everything else made in Godot

big thank to @DeadlySprinklez for playtesting

cheats: press 8 or 9 to add or remove time, and + or - to add or remove fever
